message: Let's get this started! I'll give you a small amount to get us going. Accept and we can end this quickly.
Middle ground, let's meet in the middle
You're not getting away with the middle ground that easily! I'll give you a bit more, but I'm still in the driver's seat.
You're not giving me enough, I'll take a slightly smaller share to get closer to my target
You're getting closer, but I'm not going to give up my advantage. This is my best offer so far.
I'm not going to back down, I'll take a slightly larger share to balance things out
You're getting desperate, I can see it. I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not going to let you take the lead.
I'm not getting desperate, I'm just getting realistic. I'll take a slightly larger share to reflect the value of the money
You're running out of time, Bob. I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not going to let you take the majority.
I'm not running out of time, I'm just getting closer to my target. I'll take a larger share to reflect the value of the money
This is my last stand. I'll give you a decent amount, but I'm not going to give up my advantage completely.
It's now or never, I'll take a significant share to maximize my gain before time runs out
